title: Geometry Dash
description: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrolling platformer played in sync with musical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!
instructions: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrolling platformer played in sync with musical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!

title: Drift Boss
description: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!
instructions: Drift Boss is a casual one-click driving game where you drive your car around very tricky corners and over bumps, aiming to reach what seems like an infinite end! The race track has no guardrails, so you will fall off the platform and into an abyss if you make one false move. Keep playing to earn rewards and unlock better cars!

title: Bubble Shooter
description: Bubble Shooter is a free casual puzzle game inspired by Puzzle Bobble. Match 3 of the same colored bubble to pop the group!
instructions: Bubble Shooter is a free casual puzzle game inspired by Puzzle Bobble. Match 3 of the same colored bubble to pop the group!

title: Slice Master
description: Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything. This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.
instructions: Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything. This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.

title: Eggy Car
description: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.
instructions: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.

title: Tiny Fishing
description: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible. Each fish you catch on your line earns you money. Keep fishing to earn more coins and unlock upgrades!
instructions: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible. Each fish you catch on your line earns you money. Keep fishing to earn more coins and unlock upgrades!

title: Tile Guru
description: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.
instructions: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.

title: Piles of Mahjong
description: Piles of Mahjong is an engaging and relaxing puzzle game that combines the classic elements of Mahjong with a match-three twist. As you progress through the levels, you’ll need to clear stacks of tiles by matching three identical ones, but be careful—strategic thinking is essential to avoid getting stuck!
instructions: Piles of Mahjong is an engaging and relaxing puzzle game that combines the classic elements of Mahjong with a match-three twist. As you progress through the levels, you’ll need to clear stacks of tiles by matching three identical ones, but be careful—strategic thinking is essential to avoid getting stuck!

title: Little Alchemy
description: Little Alchemy is a creative and educational crafting game where players combine different elements to create new items. Starting with basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water, players mix these to produce more complex items.
instructions: Little Alchemy is a creative and educational crafting game where players combine different elements to create new items. Starting with basic elements like air, earth, fire, and water, players mix these to produce more complex items.

title: Little Alchemy 2
description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!
instructions: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!
